attributes.action: A REQUIREMENT FOR VEICHLES TO HAVE A MOT TEST ONCE IN TWO YEARS.LIKE THE REST OF EUROPE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN EUROPE THE MOT TEST IS EVERY 2 YEARS,NOT 1 AS HERE IN UK,WE ARE SUPPOSED TO BE PART OF EUROPE.WE ADOPT LAWS MADE BY THE EU,SO WHY HAVE WE NOT ADOPTED THIS ONE.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
